lead_paragraph: H. Lee Sarokin, who presided over the first tobacco cases, is dubious of the industry’s claim that e-cigarettes promote public health.
snippet: H. Lee Sarokin, who presided over the first tobacco cases, is dubious of the industry’s claim that e-cigarettes promote public health....

headline.main: A Judge’s View of Tobacco Lobby: ‘Money Over Morality’
headline.print_headline: Judge’s View of Tobacco Lobby: ‘Money Over Morality’
